turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I am absolutely starving. Can you order me a pizza?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course. Where from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: May I please have a pie from Waleeto's down in Hawthorne?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. Is that for delivery or pickup?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll pick it up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. What would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get a medium with thin crust and red sauce?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: One medium thin crust with red sauce.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And extra cheese please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, extra cheese. What's on top?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: For toppings may I please have pepperoni and sausage?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, pepperoni and sausage. Any veggies or pineapple?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just mushrooms please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, adding mushrooms. Anything else on that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's it. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No worries. So I have a medium thin crust with red sauce...

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: â€¦with extra cheese, pepperoni, sausage, and mushroom.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. Placing your order now. Would you like a texted receipt?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That would be great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Then you are good to go. Your order's been placed and it'll be ready in about 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Always a pleasure. Enjoy your pie.
